This file scores the coded responses into our final variables. Rune this ***AFTER*** running survey_1_coding.qmd.

### Load packages and data

#### Libraries & Function

```{r}
library(groundhog)

libs <- c("dplyr", "stringr")

groundhog.library(libs, "2023-09-23")

```

#### Load coded data

```{r}
survey1 <- read.csv("survey_1_coded.csv")
```

## Morals and Values Variables

```{r}

survey_1_scored <- survey1 %>%
  mutate(
    indiv_collectivism = rowMeans(across(starts_with("x_"), ~ as.numeric(.))))  #Individualism & Collectivism

```
